item.title: A year after his death, Gene Hackman’s longtime Santa Fe home is listed for $6.25 million
item.description: Actor Gene Hackman’s longtime New Mexico compound has hit the market, a year after he and his wife, Betsy Arakawa, were found dead inside the home.
